metadata.title: CVE-2021-39895 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In all versions of GitLab CE/EE since version 8.0, an attacker can set thepipeline schedules to be active in a project export so when an unsuspectingowner imports that project, pipelines are active by default on thatproject. Under specialized conditions, this may lead to informationdisclosure if the project is imported from an untrusted source.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
